content: this pattern is for the daylily 12 crochet square i designed this crochet square for the moogly crochet along 2025 finished size 12 x 12 square skill level intermediate to advanced yarn red heart super saver medium weight #4 yarn free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/daylily-crochet-square/ by purchasing a pdf file you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format product safety this is a virus free pdf it contains embedded links to reputable websites all links are to trusted sources but discretion is always advised when using links to external websites gpsr representative ciara doyle 6 killallon close c15 y5f9 ireland email ciara@thefairythorn ie
